__e: Wait, the house wanted you to...?
He wanted you to be a lot more than that.
He told me if anything ever happened to him, he wanted you to have these.
He just didn't want Lily to have him.
But your father, he wanted me to have this.
Even though he didn't want you to have it.
That was what God wanted. And that I'd been told before.
He didn't want me to... How did he put it?
He said God wanted it inside me, but I didn't want it inside me.
(Gasps) This was me asking her if she wanted to take a bath.
Well, he wouldn't commit to having a child with me And I didn't want to wait--
I asked if she wanted a refill. That's my job.
She wanted to make up. I didn't.
And she was probably planning on doing the same thing to you.
You're the one who wanted to have the party.
He said he wanted to hurt himself and me.
The fact is, she wasn't going to.
He wanted to mash you and you said no.
Hey, you wanted to see me, sir.
I heard you wanted to see me.
Then told me he didn't want to see me again.
You know, I didn't think about it until right now, but... it was only a few days later that she said she didn't want to see me anymore.
The last time I saw your mother, she said she never wanted to see me again.
She just wanted to be a part of this family.
You know, he wants to be just like his old man.
He just... He wanted to be like his dad.
He just wanted you to be safe.
You just wanted it to be.
He just wanted you to be his friend again.
He said he just wanted to talk to the guy.
But maybe she's just trying to...
Obviously, he wanted to be a dog. Wasn't my fault he couldn't be a dog.
She wanted to be a man.
He wanted to make sure you were taken care of in case anything were to ever happen to him.
He wanted to make sure that you were ready for tomorrow.
Someone that didn't have to be me.
And for the first time, he wanted to be the one to do it.
I'm sure your mom wanted to be here for this.
Listen, what did, uh, Che mean when he said "in another life"?
I'm Donna, and what he meant to say is,
Let me talk to someone. Excuse me, doctor? Oh, no, she's got the tone.
What did he mean, I know what you are?
What could she possibly mean by that?
That's all she wanted to say at first.
[Door closes] I don't know what she said, but I know what she said.
